## Inferential statistics

```{r}
library(ez)
library(report)
```

```{r}
ANOVA_OUTPUT = 
  ezANOVA(
    data = participant_means,
    dv = mean_score,
    wid = participant,
    within = condition,
    return_aov = TRUE
  )
```

```{r}
ANOVA_OUTPUT$ANOVA %>% select(-ges) %>% kable(row.names = F, digits=4)
```
